short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Daily inspiration in your browser. Powered by GoLimitlesss.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browsing experience with GoLimitless Daily, an extension that delivers fresh, inspiring visuals created by us (GoLimitless), every day. Each illustration is designed to motivate and push you to reach new heights, offering a daily dose of encouragement to help you stay focused and energised.

With GoLimitless Daily, you'll enjoy:
∙ A new inspiration post every day
∙ A refreshing, clutter-free new tab experience
∙ Motivational artwork that sparks creativity and thoughtfulness

Whether you're looking for a moment of inspiration or just a fresh perspective, GoLimitless Daily brings visual motivation right to your browser, turning each new tab into a powerful reminder to keep pushing forward.

Quick tip: If you’re used to typing in the address bar immediately after opening a new tab, use these shortcuts to quickly refocus the cursor on the address bar:
→ Ctrl + L (Windows/Linux)
→ Cmd + L (Mac)

This extension does not collect, distribute, or process any form of data from the user.
